problems_solutions.problem: Building complex financial models like DCFs takes too long
problems_solutions.solution: AI agent that can pull 10K data and build projections automatically
steps: Ask AI to update with new data
Specify data sources and projection timeline
Let AI complete the work in 10 minutes

problems_solutions.problem: Users are not good at prompting AI for spreadsheet tasks
problems_solutions.solution: Clarifying questions UI that helps users provide better prompts
steps: AI uses refined input for better results

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Building AI tools that require expert prompting skills
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Users struggle to get value from the product
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Build clarifying questions and context-aware interfaces

actionable_quotes.quote: It's not as like a co-pilot for one or two steps. It's like it will do 90% of your entire job and then you get to do other things as that happens
